message: I have Rails and Sinatra in mind specifically.
I think https://github.com/hassox/warden is the best and the most powerful one
Devise and declarative are what I'm currently using.
Use Warden for any Rack based app and you can use Devise for Rails (that is a wrapper of Warden)
+1 for warden. But would suggest the more lightweight https://github.com/hassox/rails_warden for rails
seconded - get comfortable with the rack approach (warden), it's pretty damn good.
